sentences.sContent: What is the approximate number of students in each class?
sentences.sCn: 每个班大致有多少学生？

sentences.sContent: This figure approximates to a quarter of the UK’s annual consumption.
sentences.sCn: 这个数字接近英国年消耗量的四分之一。

phrases.pCn: 近似值，近似价值；概算价值
近似数，近似值；大概的数目

remMethod.val: ap ＋ proxim(接近) ＋ ate → 近似的

trans.tranOther: an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it
to be close to a particular number
